law_name: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
description: Protects women from physical, emotional, sexual, verbal and economic abuse by husband or family members.
why_applicable: Applies when a woman faces abuse or violence from husband or family members at home.
punishment: Protection order, residence order, monetary relief, custody orders.
actions: File complaint at local police station

description: Husband or his relatives subjecting a woman to cruelty or harassment for dowry.
why_applicable: Applies when harassment or cruelty is linked with dowry demands.
punishment: Imprisonment up to 3 years and fine.

law_name: Sexual Harassment of Women at Workplace Act, 2013
description: Protection against sexual harassment at workplace.
why_applicable: Applies when harassment occurs in professional or workplace environment.
punishment: Employer liable to take disciplinary action.

description: Prohibits marriage where girl is below 18 years.
why_applicable: Applies when marriage involves a minor girl.
punishment: Imprisonment up to 2 years and fine.

description: Giving or taking dowry is punishable offence.
why_applicable: Applies when money or property is demanded during marriage.
punishment: Imprisonment up to 5 years and fine.

description: Assault or criminal force to outrage modesty.
why_applicable: Applies when a woman faces unwanted physical contact or assault.

description: Insulting modesty through words or gestures.
why_applicable: Applies when harassment is verbal or through gestures.
punishment: Up to 3 years imprisonment and fine.

description: Publishing private images or obscene content online.
why_applicable: Applies when harassment happens through internet or social media.
punishment: Imprisonment up to 3 years and fine.

description: Protects children below 18 from sexual offences.
why_applicable: Applies when victim is a minor.

description: Prevents trafficking and exploitation of women.
why_applicable: Applies when a woman is forced into exploitation or trafficking.
punishment: Imprisonment up to 7 years or more.

description: Provides maternity leave and benefits to women employees.
why_applicable: Applies when employer denies maternity rights.

description: Ensures equal pay for equal work.
why_applicable: Applies when women are paid less than men for same work.
